website_summaries.verdict: Despite some quirks, this is an impressive world map when it comes to size and quality. But if it's too big for your needs, check out others we considered.
pros: Sports crisp details and bold colors on one of the largest world maps on the market
Printed on durable paper with sturdy lamination for added protection
cons: The downside of the large size is how awkward it is to handle
A few inaccuracies including misspellings, size discrepancies, and excluded data

customer_reviews.title: This map is not laminated, FYI. It is ...
customer_reviews.text: This map is not laminated, FYI. It is glossy, but not laminated. You have a 50/50 chance of ripping it on hanging, it is that "not laminated"
customer_reviews.author: Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful map, for a great price. It is HUGE. The perfect addition to my home office wall.
customer_reviews.author: Verkas

customer_reviews.title: Enormous And Easy To Read!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE IT!! THIS THING IS HUGE AND COLORFUL. YOU CAN READ EVERY BIT OF IT. The only thing I would point out is the fact that this is 'Paper', and it is heavy. Heavy due to it's size. If you pin it up, use at least 3 pins across the top. Be careful when you are stretching it out, to even it out. I ripped the corner on both sides of the top. I just used a piece of clear tape, and looped it over the back. Then, I put the pins through the tape. If you are careful, you will not tear it. And, it is in fact glossy.
customer_reviews.author: lautml

customer_reviews.title: Better than I anticipated
customer_reviews.text: The map is clear, attractive, and large. It has more details than I assumed it would; granted, I didn't read much about its details prior to purchasing. I think things like the city size/comparison key are very useful and interesting. I also like keys that note the IDL, ocean depth points, highest peaks in a country or continent; notes of railways, disputed areas, and other boundary points. I feel more educated and aware as I look over this map and that is all I can have wanted.
customer_reviews.author: AnotherSeeker

customer_reviews.title: Excellent map for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality map. Having gone through a few large wall maps over the years, I can say this map is well worth the price. Looks good on the wall. I would suggest flattening the map for a while before hanging. I did not do so, but it still looks good.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Huddleston

customer_reviews.title: Super Motivating
customer_reviews.text: Love it, love it, love it....On my bedroom wall with push pins marking all the places I've been. Very motivating to look at and think about all the other places I want to go. Roommate is jealous. Great price. Very large. Get the laminated one at the least. Its only 5 bucks more and totally worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Collins

customer_reviews.title: Huge map, great quality
customer_reviews.text: I love everything about this map other than it doesn't have a compass rose. I use it for homeschool, so drawing a compass rose will be an art project for my kids. The map is huge, big enough to see Rhode Island. I did not buy the laminate one. It is still pretty thick and glossy. I haven't tried wet erase markers on it yet, but it looks like they will work. This map came rolled, so it was never folded thank goodness.
customer_reviews.author: NC

customer_reviews.title: Large map that doesn't break the bank!
customer_reviews.text: Great map. We have it in our dining area and it is always being used. Everytime we sit for a meal we talk about different places on the map. Lots of questions and learning from the 9yr old. It's heavy... so simple tacks won't hold. My husband attached it to a piece of wood with hooks so it hangs from the hooks not the map itself. Large size easy to see everything. Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: CChev

customer_reviews.title: Buy this map!!
customer_reviews.text: Great map! Very high quality print! Has all major cities and capitals are marked. I haven’t came across any errors. Comes rolled up, wrapped in plastic, and in a hard cardboard tube. Be careful taking the plastic off, don’t just pull it because it’s on there pretty tight and can wrinkle the map if you do. I would also have someone help you put it up if you’re getting the big one because it’s so big that it just wants to roll itself back up. Once you finally do get it up though, it’s awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: This map is awesome!
customer_reviews.text: I've been looking for a world map for a travel wall in our house for a long time and I was thrilled to find this one at such a great price. It is HUGE and the colors are so vibrant. We love to travel so adding this to our wall and being able to mark where we've been and check out where we want to go is the best! It's a definite statement piece too as everyone that comes over stops to look at it too.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a school room
customer_reviews.text: It’s big, so giftable? I had a world map for my homeschool room but we had marked it up with flags and it was time to retire it. I saw this map and it is big, for us it’s ok. We have the wall space for it and that was actually a selling feature for me. It’s clear and easy to read. And it is a great addition to our room where we “learn”. We also got the laminated version so if we write in it, we can erase it !!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Joanne & Robert Barnes

customer_reviews.title: Awesome map of the World
customer_reviews.text: My 5 year old son said his room was so boring so I decided to decorate it. He has an interest in geography. Always asking about different countries and borrowing books on different countries so I decided to get a map to hang in his room. The map is awesome. It’s really big and laminated on both sides. High quality. My husband and I hung it up using Scotch double sided tap. My son came home from day camp and screamed with excitement when he saw it in his bedroom wall. Colors are very vibrant. Very good looking and informative map.
customer_reviews.author: JG

customer_reviews.title: ITS SOOOOOOO COOOL
customer_reviews.text: You should not use nails or push pins to put this up. It should be taped to your wall! I tried hanging this with little finishing nails, and it started to rip. I got clear packaging tape, and thought that would support the nails, and i realized that just packaging tape LOVES to hang this map! It is super easy! Map is big, it will cover an entire wall. It is BEAUTIFUL! GET IT! It is awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Theresa

customer_reviews.title: NO MAP
customer_reviews.text: When I received the package, there was no map. There was a cardboard tube inside to make noise in the package, but there was no map.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Revia de García

customer_reviews.title: High Quality, High Level of Detail, Giant Map
customer_reviews.text: This map is huge, laminated, and has a high level of detail ranging from ocean depth, city population, and topography (i.e. land surface shape) to color coded countries. In other words this map shows a lot more than simply geography, and did I mention it is huge? It's huge. These are the reasons I love it. It can get bends and wrinkles if you aren't careful with it but this is simply a result of lamination and material thickness. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: J. Conrad

customer_reviews.title: Glossy, BIG wall map
customer_reviews.text: This map will be on the wall in our "travel" room (actually the spare bedroom), along with some trinkets from our travels. Different colored push pins will designate places our family has been to, or our kids, or my wife by herself, me by myself, and us together. Should be a colorful presentation and the map is big enough and detailed enough to allow for a lot of pins.
customer_reviews.author: DA

customer_reviews.title: Impeccable quality, greatly detailed, and superb delivery promptness - highly recommended!
customer_reviews.text: Out of a handful of maps I researched based on price, quality, and delivery fees - by far Maps International overly exceeds in all fields. The lamination quality is impeccable, the details are legible and well-groomed, and the ease of putting my map up was ridiculously possible - I put it up myself. On top of that, the Customer Service Manager, Kate, sent me a courtesy follow-up email making sure I was satisfied with the overall experience. Maps International understands the detrimental importance of a customer and greatly appreciates a customer's business. Two-thumbs up, 5-star rating, and a fantastic job well-done Maps International! Keep up the superb job! Always know, you all have made a student from Texas extremely joyful.
customer_reviews.author: DC

customer_reviews.title: To get my order rather than an empty tube where the map was supposed to be.
customer_reviews.text: The tube that the map was supposed to be in came is empty. I need a replacement immediately.
customer_reviews.author: Jo Ann Stancil

customer_reviews.title: Magnificent map!
customer_reviews.text: Okay this map is awesome! I got the double laminated and it's beautiful and shiny and although i am not the best at putting things on walls, i think i did a rather good job! I'm 5'1 with a short arm span, so as you can imagine the poster was bigger than me -although i dropped it and folded it many times it didn't tear or anything!
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Perfect map!
customer_reviews.text: My order arrived without the content! Had the carrier take it back immediately. Will update when I get my map. Customer service refunded my account and I had to put in a new order. Map arrived and most beautiful! It came in a tube and wrapped inside an Amazon box this time. Very nice 👌. I highly recommend this map to anyone with the space. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Susu

customer_reviews.title: Teachable Moments
customer_reviews.text: I volunteer a small private school. I bought this map and put it up in a hall. They love it!!!! They stop and talk about it all the time. Talk about a teachable moment! They are teaching themselves. It’s gorgeous and it’s laminated. They can touch and even draw on it if they want to. Fabulous!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Beaty

customer_reviews.title: It's the bright spot at Moms home now!
customer_reviews.text: My Mom has always had a love of history & always kept a map on our walls! After the death of my Daddy ( get companion of 70 yrs!) she told me of her desire of a bigger better brighter map She loves this laminated map & even had my brother make a frame for it..... & everyone who comes by enjoys it too! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Starring_U

customer_reviews.title: Great size
customer_reviews.text: It's a great size. We're going to use it with map flags for students to mark where they were born and where their parents, grandparents and great grandparents were born so that we can see the cultures/places represented in our class. It's big enough to accommodate the 50 students involved.
customer_reviews.author: Bernadette Cranmer

customer_reviews.title: GREAT MAP
customer_reviews.text: Gigantic and beautiful! Definitely note the dimensions before ordering! Fully and properly laminated to prevent water damage or stains.It is a 2 -man-job to mount it on the wall without creasing it....Shipped in AWESOME heavy duty tube and box to protect it -and they worked perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: chris shyne

customer_reviews.title: awesome map
customer_reviews.text: I love this map, bought it for my soon to be 14 year old son and he thought it was soo cool, he loves to travel so it really gives him time to ponder where he's been and where he needs to go next. I got the 80x46 size, great price, and now I'm contemplating putting cork board behind it and framing it so he can put thumbtacks in and not have any problems against the wall. It's a keepsake for sure!
customer_reviews.author: Tracey

customer_reviews.title: This map nice big map for wall.
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking map certainly worth the price. I have to say the seller was prompt and the map came in very good condition. About the map itself its difficult to make out the Artic and Antarctic, but may be just because of the shape (round world and flat map.
customer_reviews.author: riverstone

customer_reviews.title: VERY high quality and nice vibrant colors.
customer_reviews.text: As soon as i received this giant map of the world and put it up, I was surprised by how nice and thick the lamination is. Also, my students already commented on how bright and pretty the colors are. This was also the only map i found in this nice large size. For $35, i think it is a great deal.
customer_reviews.author: Tim Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Great Size and Quality Map for Teaching!
customer_reviews.text: My husband was very pleased with the shipping method, the size and laminated quality of this world map. He is a teacher and plans to increase students vision and interest by hanging this on his classroom wall. As his students have learning disabilities, the size and presentation si very helpful.
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Terrific in a pre-teen bedroom
customer_reviews.text: I bought this map for my geography-loving preteen son to hang in his new bedroom, and he absolutely adores it. It's a beautiful map, colorful and detailed. Laminated but easy to hang. He's got a color coding system going on already with push pins- green for places he's been and blue for places he wants to go. Everything we wanted and more.
customer_reviews.author: Cait Lord

customer_reviews.title: Almost actual size ;-)
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the laminated map. It’s bigger than a door. I like this map. The colors are pleasing and it’s legible with shading to suggest mountains. I used six push pins to put it up. Very Good quality. It unwound without any problem.
customer_reviews.author: G-Man

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, HUGE, detailed map
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my son who loves maps and geography. It is hanging in his room - he loves it. The color makes it easy to differentiate between countries and the detail means it is always interesting. Great product, well-made and enormous (which is what we were looking for!)
customer_reviews.author: Peri

customer_reviews.title: Love this gorgeous, giant map in my classroom!
customer_reviews.text: I'm a teacher. This map transformed my classroom! It is huge and colorful and it just looks so great! All of my students have said so and they aren't usually complimentary. Great addition to any classroom for sure!
customer_reviews.author: FrugalSuperMommy

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Map!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for homeschooling and the kids love it. Everyone who comes over to our house comments on how much they like our map. My kids interest in other countries has increased since we bought this map.
customer_reviews.author: HT Goodwill

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, Colorful Map
customer_reviews.text: This is a large map. I purchased it to hang in my craft room...which is not completed yet. It is laminated in a glossy laminate. My geography knowledge is lacking so I thought it would be good to hang where I could readily review as needed....also wanted large so I wouldn't have to run for my glasses to see. Since I haven't hung it yet...can't say how easy that will be, but I plan on just using push pins or something similar to anchor to the wall. Am pleased with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: jill webb

customer_reviews.title: Humangous
customer_reviews.text: Wow... I know I ordered a big map, but this one is really huge. It's perfect on our basement wall where our kids play and do some projects together. It is durable too because it is laminated!
customer_reviews.author: kokomommy

customer_reviews.title: Huge map with great detail.
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my 4 year old granddaughter and when I unrolled it on the floor she was enthralled. It is very sturdy and she actually laid on it to look at different places. One of her favorite books is “Good Night Stories for Rebel Girls” which features girls from all over the world so we began by putting post it notes with the names of some of the girls onto the given countries that they are from but of course we started with a post it with her name on it. The colors make the different countries stand out and the topography details were easy to discern.
customer_reviews.author: Terry Catucci

customer_reviews.title: This is HUGE
customer_reviews.text: I read the size, but didn't comprehend it until I opened it lol THIS IS HUGE! Super nice poster and my teen loves it in her "office/school room" Very detailed and attractive looking
customer_reviews.author: D. Oakes

customer_reviews.title: Does not appear what has been described
customer_reviews.text: Description says it double sided laminated. It not even laminated at front side. It is very fragile and can be easily tore apart. Not worth this price. I discourage to pay this amount, not worth this price.
customer_reviews.author: Netra Mishra

customer_reviews.title: Everything is so legible!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a LARGE laminated map, ordered in preparation for World History AP class. It shows the tiniest countries real well, as well as capitals, cities, and their respective population based on size or shape of each color dot or square in the legend. Even shows disputed or undefined boundaries! Also shows international date line! We ordered small dot stickers to use on this map, since you can peel them off without damaging the lamination of this map. Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.author: Dee Ceela

customer_reviews.title: Huge map with great detail
customer_reviews.text: Love the colorful detail on this map. It is very large but I had it professionally framed in a very lightweight manner without a glass front and it is perfect on a big wall.
customer_reviews.author: vixen310

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Map, Well Worth the Money
customer_reviews.text: Really impressed by this map. It's got all the locations and terrain labeled, and it's really easy to tell what you're looking at with the color scheme. Honestly there are a lot of maps on Amazon of the world, and if you're debating between this one and another, go ahead and grab this one. It beats the competition hands down. The customer service was really nice, too. AND it came really well packaged. Great product, have it in my room.
customer_reviews.author: Vicente Miranda

customer_reviews.title: Height is 46" not 48"
customer_reviews.text: Great looking map, but the measurements are not true to the description. Height is actually 46", not the 48" given in the description. May be a quibble, but it might play a part in someone's decision to buy or no.
customer_reviews.author: Foamdad

customer_reviews.title: Easy to read
customer_reviews.text: Map is very large so make sure you have a wall big enough to display it. Would also be great in a school setting. Easy for children to read. I would order again from this vendor.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon C.

customer_reviews.title: Large map, laminated, world map
customer_reviews.text: Pretty nice map overall. It does seem that the sizing of the continents is incorrect, but most maps are like this as far as I know. The laminate is not thick, but it is however very glossy. having a matte finish would improve this product.
customer_reviews.author: Dave K Barman

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant, colorful, captivating
customer_reviews.text: Excellent! Easy to read and the large size alllows out whole family to peruse it at the same time. My only (small) complaint is that it doesn't show all of the earth. I understand that it's a political map, but it's primary label is a "World Map" and "Political" is the subtitle. Maybe the Van set Grinten projection wasn't the best choice, since placing it on a rectangle requires either truncation of the polar regions, or a lot of wasted space in the corners.
customer_reviews.author: RICHARD D ERNST JR

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality/Vibrant Colors
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with this map! It has vibrant colors and is a wonderful addition to my office wall! It is amazing the curiosity seekers this map brings!! People just can’t look at it and walk by! They have to stop and check it out!! The new centerpiece of my office! I received this map as told when I ordered and the quality is exceptional!! I would definitely buy again!!!
customer_reviews.author: Carol Cummings

customer_reviews.title: Perfect! Highly Recommend
customer_reviews.text: Our whole family loves this map - easy to read, detailed, and beautiful. It works perfectly on the plain white wall in our hallway. It is nicely laminated and we mounted it with double-sided tape. It was hard to find a map this large and we appreciate the detail. The map shows city populations, political boundaries, topography, mountain elevations, ocean depths and more. Perfect for home, classroom, or office/professional space. Great price for good quality!
customer_reviews.author: Mary Cooprider

customer_reviews.title: Great tool for graduate school
customer_reviews.text: As a student in a Master's Public Health program, I find this tool very helpful in global health research and related projects. I also found it to be a great resource while tracking the current world pandemic on my own! The description was very accurate and the lamination is a must-have for such a large map! The map arrived a few days quicker than expected in the middle of coronaviris lockdown in the US. I am very pleased with the seller and the product!
customer_reviews.author: Kim the chemist

customer_reviews.title: Love this. Worth every penny.
customer_reviews.text: It's huge, laminated (so wet and dry erase markers erase just fine on it), and takes up no table space (unlike globes, that my kids end up using as balls until they break). We homeschool and my kids just love finding places on this map.
customer_reviews.author: RJT

customer_reviews.title: excellent!
customer_reviews.text: very nice map! its great quality and has such vibrant colors. I'm using this in our kindergarten class to pin all the countries our mission stories are from. kids love to see where the child in the story lives.
customer_reviews.author: Mhc0522

customer_reviews.title: Stunning map!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this map for a few months now and just love it so much I decided to leave a review. It is sturdy, well colored, and current! My boyfriend and I look at it daily and it’s definitely nice to have. It is also huge! Which is what we wanted so we don’t have to squint too hard to see all the cities. Aside from all of that it’s very pretty. Great map!!
customer_reviews.author: customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth the extra money. Great wall additive.
customer_reviews.text: This is a big map of the world and ships in a tube that could be used as a baseball bat it is so rigid. Great quality map as well.
customer_reviews.author: Airiq Canna

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Would have given 5 stars but the lamination is really thin and doesn't prevent tearing at all. When tacking it to the wall. We did have a little bit of an issue with the corners on pulling and ripping a bit. Other than that the map is fantastic shipped very securely in a long hard tube. There was not a crease in the map. Not sure why the others had problems. Very colorful and perfect for the kids playroom. Very happy with the price and quality.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy F.

customer_reviews.title: All great
customer_reviews.text: I was very impressed with everything about my order, stating with , . , it arrived on the day it was promised. upon opening I noticed it was securely packaged. Looks great on my bedroom wall and I have pins In all the place I have volunteered, Mississippi, Hoduras, Cost Rica and going to Thailand in the late spring. Thank you so much, I can even read it without my glasses! Donna
customer_reviews.author: Donna Russell

customer_reviews.title: Easy to read and locate what you need
customer_reviews.text: Easy to maintain. Colorful without being overbearing. Bought the map for a wall in my living room to help my now 7 year old daughter study up on geography and be ahead of the game at school. Works well for anyone who's full of questions about where or what someplace is. A good casual gift idea for people interested in learning.
customer_reviews.author: Nathaniel Wells

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Wall Map
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this map for my classroom wall and it looks awesome! I was very happy to see the quality of the map for the price I paid. It is a colorful political map which also shows physical features and is covered with heavy, double-side lamination. It's the perfect size to allow my students to easily find the country they are from. I would highly recommend it if you want a great map at a great price.
customer_reviews.author: Pet Lover

customer_reviews.title: World Map
customer_reviews.text: The size is very big which is what I wanted. plasticized so it doesn't tear. easy to see the worlds countries.
customer_reviews.author: Matti

customer_reviews.title: Sad opinion
customer_reviews.text: I was so exited to received my map, when I opne it, it was just an empty box, so sad. Now I'm trying to figure out how to make the return policy.
customer_reviews.author: Monica

customer_reviews.title: Accurate and well laminated
customer_reviews.text: Arrived in a well packaged tube and updated map on 2019. Laminated and easy to put on my wall. Excellent item.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great map!
customer_reviews.text: I'm very pleased with this map. Consequently, I took it to a local shop and spent a couple hundred dollars to have it framed. Then it will occupy a prominent wall space in my den. Anxiously waiting the framing ... so when whatever news spot is hot - Ukraine, South China Sea, North Korea, Brazil, wherever - I can just go to my new wall map and be much better informed. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Norno

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great map. You can read everything nice and clearly. Perfect for helping the kids with geography homework.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Great home schooling tool!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to read! The laminated side works well with dry erase markers. Also, this particular projection that shows how Alaska and upper Asia wrap around the North Pole sparked a great conversation.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle B.

customer_reviews.title: Nice, big map for a classroom.
customer_reviews.text: Put in my classroom and it works great. I refer to it at least once or twice a day.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful colors, the type is very clear
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful colors, the type is very clear. The laminate is good quality. When I took it out of the packing tube I used the tube to roll it gently the opposite way and it was flat. It looks great in our den and the kids have been looking at all the countries they have visited.
customer_reviews.author: Camper Sam

customer_reviews.title: Good size, easy to read and good price
customer_reviews.text: Great size map, colorful and easy to read. Laminated so durable. Great for kids to learn.
customer_reviews.author: Robyn J. Marques

customer_reviews.title: Great presentation
customer_reviews.text: This map came well-packaged and is detailed as they say. My older map had seen better years, so I was happy to find another large one that now hangs in my hallway.
customer_reviews.author: L'homme russe

customer_reviews.title: High quality!
customer_reviews.text: This map is so accurate, distinctive, and high-quality! My nine-year-old, who is a geography nut, loves studying it. I love the way it looks on the wall in our family room.
customer_reviews.author: LD

customer_reviews.title: Great !
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my kids. It is huge! They love it. My six year old was disappointed it didn’t show the capitals but overall looks great
customer_reviews.author: Jon

customer_reviews.title: Great big size
customer_reviews.text: Great big size, laminated, and lightweight enough to easily hang with Command poster strips (used about 10 of them around perimeter of map, easy peasy). I was happily surprised at how bright, colorful and cheerful the whole map looks. It really brightened up an entire wall of my son's bedroom. Great focal point for a kid's room and of course educational, too.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Cameron

customer_reviews.title: Very impressed!
customer_reviews.text: Easy ti read, big, laminated, up to date. (It lists Czechia as the new name for Czech Republic.) What else could one ask for?
customer_reviews.author: jimintexas

customer_reviews.title: Print is bold and very easy to read and beautiful to look at
customer_reviews.text: The map was purchased for our boss for his birthday, who loves geography and traveling.We needed to fill a large wall space in our office and this map worked out well. He loves it!! And Exceeded my expectations and looks great. I would purchase again. Would work well in a classroom setting as well. Shipped in a tube therefore arrived in perfect condition.
customer_reviews.author: Judy Trahan

customer_reviews.title: This gift made my nephew's day
customer_reviews.text: My nephew loves maps so I ordered this. Made his day and he even said it's one of his favorite presents. Five stars from me!
customer_reviews.author: Magma

customer_reviews.title: A very big map
customer_reviews.text: This is a very big map which is good. However, I believe that the Van Der Grinten projection that this map uses is highly misleading and a real step down from the standard Mercator projection, despite the faults of the Mercator projection. The fact that the northern hemisphere is wildly enlarged grinds my gears every time I look at it
customer_reviews.author: Oliver Gibbon

customer_reviews.title: Vibrant, colorful map!
customer_reviews.text: Felt like a kid again viewing the countries and continents of the world. Vibrant, large colorful map.
customer_reviews.author: S.Mac

customer_reviews.title: Exceeded our expectations
customer_reviews.text: The map came well packaged, in a long outer box with the map rolled up inside of a heavy duty cardboard tube. The map itself is so large that we have spent considerable time planning how to mount it on the wall. Very readable and colorful.
customer_reviews.author: NH Mark

customer_reviews.title: Map
customer_reviews.text: My map is proudly hung on my living room wall. I had it framed and it looks really nice.
customer_reviews.author: John Strini

customer_reviews.title: very impressed
customer_reviews.text: great map with a potential for opportunities for mission travel spots
customer_reviews.author: tata4

customer_reviews.title: find a place for the map before you order.
customer_reviews.text: still searching for the perfect wall to display the map. it is indeed large. beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: scott allen

customer_reviews.title: Great map for the kids room or the office
customer_reviews.text: Great map for the kids room or the office. The reason I gave it a four star is because some of the cities smaller ones are absent. Overall a good quality

customer_reviews.title: Awesome poster! Just what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: Awesome poster! Just what I wanted... Large, thin yet sturdy with the laminated front! Image is clear and the product came well packaged for safe arrival and came in only two days. Love it!

customer_reviews.text: I bought this for an ESL class and it is big and beautiful! Nice quality and well packaged.

customer_reviews.title: Great map. Almost 5 stars.
customer_reviews.text: If the lamination extended even 1mm beyond the edge of the map I would have given it 5 stars. Otherwise it's a really nice map for the price.

customer_reviews.title: Durable and detailed
customer_reviews.text: Put mine up in the garage as something to look at when I'm bored and need to learn something.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful map
customer_reviews.text: I have been looking for a large map for our grandkids room. This one is beautiful. It's easy to read and has good quality lamination. Although its comes rolled up in a tube it immediately lays flat for installation. I would recommend if you are looking for a good quality map especially one with this large format.

customer_reviews.title: Great map and very detailed
customer_reviews.text: My son is totally into maps right now and this was a huge hit! Colors are great and it's massive!

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality, easy to read, firm laminated paper, 100% worth buying.

customer_reviews.title: Beautifully printed with excellent eye catching colors.
customer_reviews.text: Beautifully printed with excellent eye catching colors. Looks great and love the details. You will definitely need two people to help hang this up, as it is massive, so keep that in mind.
customer_reviews.author: cyak1551

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my daughter's homeschool room, but we all love it! It's HUGE, clear, and durable. We sat around talking about a news story last night and my kids really liked being able to see where the story took place in relation to where we live.
customer_reviews.author: Robert C. Wood

customer_reviews.title: Love this map.
customer_reviews.text: My son loves how oversized and clear it is to read. Going to last significantly longer than my last given it's well laminated.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: It’s beautiful! It was a gift but too big to ship to Germany and I was unaware.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: The product will be an excellent addition to my study. It met and exceeded my expectation. Cartographically it was well put together. I would not hesitate to recommend it to people who need serious a map for their home. My issue is finding an inexpensive hanging material since it is a but oversized.

customer_reviews.title: Great quality map
customer_reviews.text: This map is amazing! It’s very high quality & nicely shipped.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea

customer_reviews.title: Where is the world is....?
customer_reviews.text: Finally, a map big enough for me to easily find all these little places I hear about or read about. It's lots a fun and a real curiosity solution. Instead of saying to myself..."I should look that up", I can now just look on the map. When I ordered it it seemed silly, but I'm so glad I have it now!

customer_reviews.title: High quality, recommended

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful map, especially for the price. I built a frame using simple wood from lowes and stained it and nail gunned it to the back of the frame and it looks as though it would cost far more. Great product!

product_meta.title: Maps International Giant World Map - Mega-Map of the World - 80 x 46 - Full Lamination
feature_bullets: EXTRA LARGE WALL MAP is the LARGEST WORLD MAP AVAILABLE AS A SINGLE PRINTED SHEET: This giant map of the world measures an enormous 46 x 80 inches, with a 1:20m scale, making it an eye catching addition to any room. Perfect map for your back to school supplies.
STUNNING DETAIL: The political map of the world features colored countries, clear towns and cities, and the world map is finished with hill and sea shading.
WRITE-ON WORLD MAP: Heat sealed between two sheets of industrial quality film, this map is laminated and perfect as a classroom world map as it can be written on with whiteboard pen and wiped clean.
CREASE-LESS DELIVERY: Your huge world map poster is rolled in a tube for delivery, so it arrives ready to display.
MAPS INTERNATIONAL: Our philosophy of ‘cartographic excellence’ combines detail, design and high quality finishes in a range of stunning wall maps.
